full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO'I BZLOG BSGYUR RKYEN NGAN SEL BYED ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (CES 'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJE'I GSHED KYI BKA' SDOD DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO BZLOG BSGYUR RKYEN NGAN SEL BYED ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, KHA CIG GIS 'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI BZLOG BSGYUR ZER BA DE LA CHOS RGYAL GYI SKU GZUGS BAYS NAS BZLOG BSGYUR ZHES MING BTAGS NAS TSIGS MI MTHUN PA GCIG BYA PA MANG PO 'DOD PA DANG, CHOS RGYAL GYI BZLOG BSGYUR YIG RNYING NA RNYED PA DANG, SNGA MO NAS DON GNYER CAN 'GA' BSKUL ZHING, SLAR YANG SMAN RAN PA BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS KYIS SBYIN BDAG GI RIM GROR DGOS PA CHE ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGO MA CHOG PAR RANG DANG SKAL MNYAM GZHAN LA'ANG PHAN PA AE SRID SNYAM PAS SLOB MA NYER BA BYAS PA'I BLUN PO KHAMS CAN CHOS RJE BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS MING CAN GYIS BLA MA GONG MA RNAMS KYIS GSUNG RGYUN LA BSTEN NAS SUG BRIS BGYIS PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,LEGS SO, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
